# The `InstStreamPause` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This is actually not an error but a marker to indicate that the instruction stream is paused. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This is actually not an error but a marker to indicate that the instruction stream is paused.

Definition at line 90 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mca/include/llvm/mca/stages/stage-h">Stage.h</a>.

## Public Member Functions

### convertToErrorCode() {#a5a85107a2f649c2f0f65cd425b8453f6}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::error&#95;code llvm::mca::InstStreamPause::convertToErrorCode () const</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Convert this error to a std::error&#95;code.

This is a temporary crutch to enable interaction with code still using std::error&#95;code. It will be removed in the future.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mca/include/llvm/mca/stages/stage-h/#l00093">93</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mca/include/llvm/mca/stages/stage-h">Stage.h</a>.
